# Installation
Install BASS R package maintained in [github](https://github.com/zhengli09/BASS) 
through the "devtools" package.
```{r eval = FALSE}
if(!require(devtools))
  install.packages(devtools)
devtools::install_github("zhengli09/BASS")
```
```{r}
library(BASS)
```
